citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"273bbdf4-1e1d-4149-8b9e-5b125bb22987\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Marine Institute - CTec - SmartAtlantic\"}, {\"literal\": \"DFO-MPO\"}, {\"literal\": \"Fisheries and Oceans Canada - P\\u00eaches et Oc\\u00e9ans Canada\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"08\", \"06\"]}], \"abstract\": \"POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): est une jauge de temp\u00e9rature et de pression de l'eau situ\u00e9e \u00e0 Pools' Cove, Belle Bay. La station est \u00e9quip\u00e9e d'une sonde HydroMet OTT (PLS) mesurant la pression et la temp\u00e9rature de l'eau. La sonde est connect\u00e9e \u00e0 un enregistreur SUTRON Satlink2-V2 qui collecte les valeurs moyennes d'une minute (\u00e0 partir d'un \u00e9chantillonnage interne \u00e0 1 Hz) enregistr\u00e9es toutes les 10 minutes et transmises via une antenne GOES omnidirectionnelle toutes les heures. La station est install\u00e9e sur un quai et la sonde est amarr\u00e9 \u00e0 environ 1.5 m de profondeur du niveau moyen de la mer. Cette station a \u00e9t\u00e9 install\u00e9e dans le cadre d'un programme de surveillance qui s'est d\u00e9roul\u00e9 de mai 2015 \u00e0 mai 2017 et qui visait \u00e0 comprendre la dynamique oc\u00e9anique dominante de la baie de Fortune. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 entretenu depuis et visit\u00e9 chaque ann\u00e9e (environ) bien qu'il ait souffert d'une d\u00e9faillance instrumentale de fin 2018 \u00e0 fin 2020. Les d\u00e9tails du programme de recherche original sont disponible sur https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Fortune Bay: Pool's Cove - POOLC\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/273bbdf4-1e1d-4149-8b9e-5b125bb22987?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"273bbdf4-1e1d-4149-8b9e-5b125bb22987\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Marine Institute - CTec - SmartAtlantic\"}, {\"literal\": \"DFO-MPO\"}, {\"literal\": \"Fisheries and Oceans Canada - P\\u00eaches et Oc\\u00e9ans Canada\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"08\", \"06\"]}], \"abstract\": \"POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): is a water temperature and pressure gauge located in Pool's Cove, Fortune Bay. The station is equipped with an HydroMet OTT Pressure Level Sensor (PLS) measuring water pressure and temperature. The sensor is connected to a SUTRON Satlink2-V2 which collect 1 min average values (from a 1 Hz internal sampling) logged every 10 min and transmitted via an Omni-directional GOES antenna every hour. The station is installed on a wharf and the sensor is moored at about 1.5 m depth from mean sea level. This station was installed as part of a bay-scale monitoring program that occurred from May 2015 to May 2017 and that aimed at understanding the dominant ocean dynamics of Fortune Bay. It has been maintained ever since and visited on a yearly basis (approximately) though it suffered from instrument failure from late 2018 to late 2020. Details on the original program can be found at https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Fortune Bay: Pool's Cove - POOLC\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/273bbdf4-1e1d-4149-8b9e-5b125bb22987?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): is a water temperature and pressure gauge located in Pool's Cove, Fortune Bay. The station is equipped with an HydroMet OTT Pressure Level Sensor (PLS) measuring water pressure and temperature. The sensor is connected to a SUTRON Satlink2-V2 which collect 1 min average values (from a 1 Hz internal sampling) logged every 10 min and transmitted via an Omni-directional GOES antenna every hour. The station is installed on a wharf and the sensor is moored at about 1.5 m depth from mean sea level. This station was installed as part of a bay-scale monitoring program that occurred from May 2015 to May 2017 and that aimed at understanding the dominant ocean dynamics of Fortune Bay. It has been maintained ever since and visited on a yearly basis (approximately) though it suffered from instrument failure from late 2018 to late 2020. Details on the original program can be found at https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): est une jauge de temp\u00e9rature et de pression de l'eau situ\u00e9e \u00e0 Pools' Cove, Belle Bay. La station est \u00e9quip\u00e9e d'une sonde HydroMet OTT (PLS) mesurant la pression et la temp\u00e9rature de l'eau. La sonde est connect\u00e9e \u00e0 un enregistreur SUTRON Satlink2-V2 qui collecte les valeurs moyennes d'une minute (\u00e0 partir d'un \u00e9chantillonnage interne \u00e0 1 Hz) enregistr\u00e9es toutes les 10 minutes et transmises via une antenne GOES omnidirectionnelle toutes les heures. La station est install\u00e9e sur un quai et la sonde est amarr\u00e9 \u00e0 environ 1.5 m de profondeur du niveau moyen de la mer. Cette station a \u00e9t\u00e9 install\u00e9e dans le cadre d'un programme de surveillance qui s'est d\u00e9roul\u00e9 de mai 2015 \u00e0 mai 2017 et qui visait \u00e0 comprendre la dynamique oc\u00e9anique dominante de la baie de Fortune. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 entretenu depuis et visit\u00e9 chaque ann\u00e9e (environ) bien qu'il ait souffert d'une d\u00e9faillance instrumentale de fin 2018 \u00e0 fin 2020. Les d\u00e9tails du programme de recherche original sont disponible sur https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

        </mcc:MD_ProgressCode>
      </mri:status>

name: 273bbdf4-1e1d-4149-8b9e-5b125bb22987
notes: POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): is a water temperature and pressure gauge located in Pool's Cove, Fortune Bay. The station is equipped with an HydroMet OTT Pressure Level Sensor (PLS) measuring water pressure and temperature. The sensor is connected to a SUTRON Satlink2-V2 which collect 1 min average values (from a 1 Hz internal sampling) logged every 10 min and transmitted via an Omni-directional GOES antenna every hour. The station is installed on a wharf and the sensor is moored at about 1.5 m depth from mean sea level. This station was installed as part of a bay-scale monitoring program that occurred from May 2015 to May 2017 and that aimed at understanding the dominant ocean dynamics of Fortune Bay. It has been maintained ever since and visited on a yearly basis (approximately) though it suffered from instrument failure from late 2018 to late 2020. Details on the original program can be found at https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html

notes_translated.en: POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): is a water temperature and pressure gauge located in Pool's Cove, Fortune Bay. The station is equipped with an HydroMet OTT Pressure Level Sensor (PLS) measuring water pressure and temperature. The sensor is connected to a SUTRON Satlink2-V2 which collect 1 min average values (from a 1 Hz internal sampling) logged every 10 min and transmitted via an Omni-directional GOES antenna every hour. The station is installed on a wharf and the sensor is moored at about 1.5 m depth from mean sea level. This station was installed as part of a bay-scale monitoring program that occurred from May 2015 to May 2017 and that aimed at understanding the dominant ocean dynamics of Fortune Bay. It has been maintained ever since and visited on a yearly basis (approximately) though it suffered from instrument failure from late 2018 to late 2020. Details on the original program can be found at https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html
notes_translated.fr: POOLC (47.679933 N, 55.43001667 W): est une jauge de température et de pression de l'eau située à Pools' Cove, Belle Bay. La station est équipée d'une sonde HydroMet OTT (PLS) mesurant la pression et la température de l'eau. La sonde est connectée à un enregistreur SUTRON Satlink2-V2 qui collecte les valeurs moyennes d'une minute (à partir d'un échantillonnage interne à 1 Hz) enregistrées toutes les 10 minutes et transmises via une antenne GOES omnidirectionnelle toutes les heures. La station est installée sur un quai et la sonde est amarré à environ 1.5 m de profondeur du niveau moyen de la mer. Cette station a été installée dans le cadre d'un programme de surveillance qui s'est déroulé de mai 2015 à mai 2017 et qui visait à comprendre la dynamique océanique dominante de la baie de Fortune. Il a été entretenu depuis et visité chaque année (environ) bien qu'il ait souffert d'une défaillance instrumentale de fin 2018 à fin 2020. Les détails du programme de recherche original sont disponible sur https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/12/1877/2020/essd-12-1877-2020.html

description_translated.fr:
CIOOS-Atlantic est un consortium d’institutions partenaires engagées dans le développement de la gestion et la diffusion des données océanographiques de la côte Atlantique, du Labrador à la frontière entre le Maine et le Nouveau-Brunswick.

La collaboration continue avec un large éventail de parties prenantes fait partie intégrante de CIOOS-Atlantique, et nous travaillerons pour répondre aux besoins de la communauté océanographique et veiller à ce que les intérêts régionaux soient représentés au niveau national. L'accent est mis sur la création d'un système qui facilite l'accès aux données afin de soutenir le travail des partenaires, chercheurs, industries, etc.
description_translated.en:
CIOOS-Atlantic is a consortium of partner institutions which are committed to the development of a data management and dissemination approach for oceanographic data from the Atlantic Seaboard, a region spanning from Labrador to the Maine / New Brunswick border.

Meaningful engagement and ongoing communication with a broad variety of stakeholders is an integral component of CIOOS-Atlantic, and we will work to meet the needs of the local oceanographic community and ensure regional interests are represented at the national level. Emphasis is placed on the creation of a system which promotes easy data access and supports the work of partners, researchers, industry, and more.

title: Fortune Bay: Pool's Cove - POOLC
